name: Rasmus the Rat and the Pink Bowler Hat
name_original: Rasmus the Rat and the Pink Bowler Hat
description:
Use the Arrow keys to move around. 

The game has two endings.

🎩🐀🛏️

Created in 3 days for the January 2020 Bitsy Jam. 
It was my first time using Bitsy and my first time making something alone.

Thanks to Jessica Pritchard for story and rhyming help.
Thanks to Jodie Struthers for some free animal sprites.
Thanks to Adam Le Doux for Bitsy and hosting the Rat Jam.
Thanks to Claire Morley for the Bitsy tutorial.
Thanks to David Mowatt (ducklingsmith) for problem solving and helpful answers.
